item.description:
Red Line Bar Crawl!

Visit a bunch of bars (all on the T's Red Line) in one night. Here's the list as of now (I'll change it with your advice!)

Start at 7pm
1. Davis Square - Joshua Tree
2. Porter Square - Christopher's or Tavern in the Square
3. Harvard Square - Hong Kong or Tommy Doyle's
4. Central Square - Tavern in the Square

We can also continue on to MGH, downtown, or South Station.

Besides the first bar, this list is a rough outline. We will see where the night takes us! If you'd like to join us later in the night, call or text me to find out where we are!

My cell number is 508-314-5357
item.name: Red Line Bar Crawl
